channel.title: Why Does the Chaos Elemental Disconnect me?
channel.description:
No joke - it disconnects me when I attack it after 1-2 hits (it unequips weapon as well)
any code that could do this??
/how do i fix?
here's a screeny of the bad boy:
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/BadChaosElemental.jpg[/img]
